price: 85. Mpe liloba likokweyaka likolo lia bango тропа bobubi bwa bango, mpe bakokoka koloba eleko te.
arabic: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wawaqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūna
